ch0067_01_leader1/0101_0701_02_10:
We should, like, do something together today!
I mean, YOLO, right?
ch0067_01_leader1/7101_0701_01_10:
Like how I talk? Hehe. It’s probably ’cause I
know, like, all the latest slang and buzzwords
and stuff.
ch0067_01_leader1/7101_0701_02_10:
Knowing what’s trending is pretty much like a
full-time job, though. Seriously. I may not look
like it, but I’m a suuuper hard worker.
ch0067_01_leader1/7102_0701_01_10:
Sawyer does it aaall. He works all day, he
cooks, he’s a bodyguard... I mean, the dude
can do anything!
ch0067_01_leader1/7102_0701_02_10:
There’s, like, nooo way I could do all that.
But I know one thing I CAN do...
ch0067_01_leader1/7102_0701_03_10:
Make people smile! Hehe. I’m like the happiness
fairy, spreadin’ happiness wherever I go!
ch0067_01_leader1/7103_0701_01_10:
There are sooo many Trainers on Pasio with
killer fashion sense, it’s, like, not even funny.
I’ve been keeping my eye out.
ch0067_01_leader1/7103_0701_02_10:
I’ve seen kimono-inspired looks, aqua-blue
bodysuits... Like, seriously. These girls are
cruuushing it.
ch0067_01_leader1/7103_0701_03_10:
Kinda makes me wanna start up a fashion
boutique... I could sell all kinds of unique styles
like that.
ch0067_01_leader1/7104_0701_01_10:
Ugh! Me ’n’ Sawyer ended up buttin’ heads
again today over nothing!
ch0067_01_leader1/7104_0701_02_10:
I mean, “Who cares about Master Lear the most?”
Is that even a question?!
ch0067_01_leader1/7104_0701_03_10:
It’s totally ME! Next time I see him, I’m gonna
prove I’m right and he’s wrong!
ch0067_01_leader1/7105_0701_01_10:
D’you ever feel like there’s, like, not enough
fun stuff to do on Pasio?
ch0067_01_leader1/7105_0701_02_10:
We need more, like, make-you-wanna-SCREAM
kinda fun! Fun that makes you wanna get up and
DANCE! WOOT WOOT!
ch0067_01_leader1/7105_0701_03_10:
Don’t you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
I’m gonna have to sit down and have a reeeal
talk with Master Lear about this soon.
ch0067_01_leader1/1701_0701_01_10: Heyyy, good timing! Here, take this.
ch0067_01_leader1/1701_0702_01_10: Promise me you won’t let it go to waste, ’kay!
ch0067_01_leader1/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve been working for Master Lear foreeeever.
Since I grew up at the castle, I pretty much
watched him grow up, too!
ch0067_01_leader1/2501_0701_02_10:
He’s all cool and handsome nowadays, but he was
a li’l cutie when he was younger!
ch0067_01_leader1/2501_0701_03_10:
Aww... *chuckle* Just thinking about those days
is making me blush!
ch0067_01_leader1/2501_0702_01_10:
Master Lear’s always gonna be number one in
my heart! No one else’ll ever come close!
ch0067_01_leader1/2501_0702_02_10: Never give up, Rachel! Your love is reeeal!
ch0067_01_leader1/2511_0701_01_10:
Y’know, I can’t really say this when Master Lear’s
around...but I like you, kid!
ch0067_01_leader1/2511_0701_02_10:
Like, nowhere near as much as I like Master
Leeear, but yeah!
ch0067_01_leader1/2511_0701_03_10:
So, like...if you ever need something, lemme
know. Maybe I can help you out. If you’re lucky.
ch0067_01_leader1/2511_0702_01_10:
Glasses are pretty boss, huh. These are, like, my
favorite pair. Don’t they make me look smart?
ch0067_01_leader1/2511_0702_02_10:
Ooooh, I should shop around for a pair that’ll go
with your style. You’re gonna look sliiick!
ch0067_01_leader1/3001_0701_01_10:
*yawn* Y’know what would reeeally help me
wake up this morning? A nap... I’m gonna go
do that...
ch0067_01_leader1/3003_0701_01_10:
Lunchtiiime! I dunno if you know this, but
Sawyer’s cooking is, like, disgustingly good.
Wanna eat with us today?
ch0067_01_leader1/3005_0701_01_10:
Today was, like, craaaazy fun, huh?
I hope me ’n’ Master Lear totally crush it
tomorrow, too.
